templates.title: Design Templates
templates.subtitle: Choose which Photoshop PSD template to use for your automation.
templates.standard_desc: Default layout with full odds and logos. Best for general match previews.
templates.minimal_desc: Condensed layout for social media stories without complex odds.
templates.basketball_desc: Specialized layout without draw (X) odds. Optimized for court sports.

tutorial.ps_warning: ⚠️ Your Photoshop application must be open before starting.
tutorial.step1_desc: Click on matches in the live tracker to automatically add them to your batch. Odds and time will be pre-filled.
tutorial.step2_desc: You can write matches manually. Use the pipe '|' symbol to override time and date details.
tutorial.step3_desc: Switch between Football and Basketball designs in the Templates tab.
tutorial.step4_desc: Press 'Generate PSD' to trigger Photoshop. Your image will be saved in the /Mac folder. Your Photoshop application must be open before starting.
